name: MONSTER BASH 2.6
description:
MONSTER BASH is a free, fps infinite shooter involving monsters, get the highest score possible while avoiding enemies of many types and bosses with unique abilities. coming soon: more maps, more enemies, new weapon, better ui. NEW UPDATE:

COMING SOON: CAMPAING.

removed mines and replaced em with the detenator, 

places self detonared grenades that stick to walls

does 100 damage

max is 5 grenades for 500dmg max
